item.title: Ford's Guidance Cut Couldn't Stop a New 52-Week High
item.description: Ford's stock hit a new 52-week high as investors focused on Q3 earnings and the strength of its core business, looking past a temporary guidance cut.

item.title: UnitedHealth Group’s Recovery in Full Swing: Buy While It's Down
